entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
